title: Tritonium
description: Poseidon, god of the sea, must rescue his brotherâ€™s daughters from the planet Mangina. The product from an affair, the girl's existence needs to be kept away from Zeus' wife. Done with protecting his brother, he sends his son, Triton and friends into outer space. The boys go on an intergalactic voyage with a spaceship pulled from the future, and a sexy AI computer named, CHANEL.
author: Yelle Hughes
